Label: Agriculture
Definition: Agriculture including crops, livestock and agribusiness.

Label: Buildings
Definition: Residential, commercial, industrial and public-service buildings such as education, healthcare, governmental buildings, etc.

Label: Infrastructure
Definition: Lifelines infrastructure, including transport, communications, energy, water.

Label: Natural environment
Definition: The natural environment, including forestry and other types of vegetation.

Label: Economic Indicator
Definition: Economic activity and growth, including measures of economic value such as Gross Domestic Product (GDP).

Label: Development Index
Definition: Social development, or social and economic development, such as the Human Development Index (HDI).
